content: last st sl1 rnds 2-3 knit around round 4 p1 sl1kw wyif p1 to end rnds 5-6 knit around * repeat rnds 1-6 three more times then repeat round 1 before beginning ribbing 2 ribbing 2 round 1 k2 p1 around *repeat round 1 four more times bobble in pattern cut yarn and weave in ends let s stay connected website shop instagram facebook ravelry please use hashtags #emeraldsongheadband and #knitfarious when sharing photos and tag me @knitfarious so i don t miss them i absolutely love seeing your finished projects for pattern support please email me at info@knitfarious com emerald song headband © 2024 by christina garza-brown page 3 knitfarious com all rights reserved
